casebody.data:
HOUSE OF RAEFORD FARMS, INC.
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES. No. 301P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 8th of September 2015 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
